attributes.action: To bring about change that would allow police officers to  walk the beat nationwide.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need to get back to basics and return to the days when policemen walked the beat.  A beat officer will know his beat and the local people in the community.  It would hopefully encourage greater relations with the public and reassure the public in general who are intimidated by the current wave of anti-social behavior.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
